backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining data types and persistent maps for healthcare services, insurance terms, assistance programs, community resources, and workshops, with initialization and query functions for a healthcare navigation app.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping each product feature (hero section, find care, insurance glossary, appointment checklist, etc.) to their implementing frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON snippet providing one-sentence summaries for three frontend files: App.tsx (router setup), EducationPage.tsx (workshops page), and AboutPage.tsx (mission/vision page).
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point that defines CSS custom property design tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the React SPA titled 'Healthcare Navigation Help' that mounts the app into a root div and loads the main TypeScript entry point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application file that configures TanStack Router with a persistent Navigation/Footer root layout and registers all 11 page routes including a dynamic journey route.
frontend/src/components/CalloutBox.tsx: Reusable callout/alert box component supporting four variants (info, tip, warning, right) with corresponding icons and color styling using Lucide icons.
frontend/src/components/ChecklistSection: Interactive checklist section component that renders a titled group of checkable items with completion progress, strikethrough on completion, and toggle callbacks.
frontend/src/components/GuideStep.tsx: Numbered guide step component that displays a step number in a circular badge, a title, and child content with a vertical connector line for use in sequential guides.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner component featuring a full-width image with gradient overlay, the mission statement, two CTA buttons linking to find-care and navigation-tools, and a stats bar with community/free/local highlights.
frontend/src/components/InsuranceTermCar: Card component that displays a single insurance term and its plain-language definition, typed against the backend InsuranceTerm type.
frontend/src/components/JourneyCard.tsx: Renders a card for a healthcare journey with its icon, title, description, step count, and a link to start the journey.
frontend/src/components/Navigation.tsx: Provides a sticky top navigation header with desktop and mobile (hamburger) menus linking to all app pages, plus a footer component.
frontend/src/components/ProgramCard.tsx: Displays a financial assistance program card showing its name, description, eligibility requirements, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/ProgressIndicato: Shows a progress bar with completed/total item counts and percentage, with a completion message at 100%.
frontend/src/components/ResourceDirector: Renders a community resource listing with address, phone, optional website, and a color-coded resource type badge.
frontend/src/components/ServiceCategoryC: Displays a healthcare service card with a category icon, color-coded badge, description, and optional contact info.
frontend/src/components/StepNavigator.ts: Renders previous/next navigation buttons and a dot-based step indicator for multi-step flows.
frontend/src/components/WorkshopCard.tsx: Displays a workshop card with title, description, audience, optional date, and optional location details.
frontend/src/data/journeys.ts: Defines the Journey and JourneyStep TypeScript interfaces and exports an array of guided healthcare journeys (e.g., no insurance, confusing bill) with step-by-step instructions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and hook for Internet Identity authentication on the ICP platform, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching healthcare services, insurance terms, assistance programs, community resources, and workshops from the backend actor, plus a mutation to initialize data.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Tailwind CSS and Google Fonts, defining a warm teal-green CSS custom property theme with light/dark mode variants and print styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page describing the Healthcare Navigation Help program's mission, services offered, and the communities it serves.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentPrepPage.t: Interactive appointment preparation checklist page with sections for documents, questions to ask, and advocacy tips, including progress tracking and a print option.
frontend/src/pages/EducationPage.tsx: Education page displaying filterable workshops and guides fetched from the backend (with fallback static data), categorized into Workshop, Guide, and Advocacy types.
frontend/src/pages/FinancialAssistancePa: Displays a filterable list of financial assistance programs (e.g., MassHealth, charity care) with tag-based filtering. Falls back to hardcoded program data if the backend returns nothing.
frontend/src/pages/FindCarePage.tsx: Renders a filterable directory of local healthcare services grouped by category (Urgent Care, Routine Care, etc.). Uses backend data when available, otherwise falls back to hardcoded service entries.
frontend/src/pages/GuidedJourneyPage.tsx: Step-by-step guided journey page that reads a journeyId route param, displays progress, and lets users navigate through journey steps with tips and action links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section, a grid of quick-link cards to major site sections, and a 'what we do' checklist summarizing the platform's purpose.
frontend/src/pages/InsuranceGuidePage.ts: Searchable glossary of insurance terms with definitions, using backend data or a comprehensive hardcoded fallback list when the backend is empty.
A detailed guide page for understanding medical bills, covering how to read a bill, common billing errors, and payment/assistance options using accordion and callout components.
frontend/src/pages/NavigationToolsPage.t: A page displaying guided healthcare journey cards fetched from a journeys data source, with a three-step explanation of how the guided journeys work.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: A filterable community resource directory page for Leominster, MA that fetches resources via a query hook and falls back to hardcoded local resources if none are returned.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Nunito/Lora), OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, and animations, with typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing Healthcare Navigation Help, a community web app for Leominster, MA residents, including its architecture notes, existing features, and image requirements.
